uk.ac.uea.framework

Interface FileIO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidFileIO

    public interface FileIO
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for file input/output

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SharedPreferences getSharedPref()
      Method to return preference data (android API) from the app-wide settings
      java.io.InputStream readAsset(java.lang.String file)
      Method to read in an asset from a file location.
      java.io.InputStream readFile(java.lang.String file)
      Method that takes a file location and returns an InputStream that can be used to read the data
      java.io.OutputStream writeFile(java.lang.String file)
      Method that takes a potential file location and creates a new file that writes data to it

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        java.io.InputStream readFile(java.lang.String file)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Method that takes a file location and returns an InputStream that can be used to read the data
        Parameters:
        file - location of file to be loaded
        Returns:
        the InputStream object of the loaded file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the file path specified is incorrect

      • writeFile

        java.io.OutputStream writeFile(java.lang.String file)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Method that takes a potential file location and creates a new file that writes data to it
        Parameters:
        file - the location of the new file to be created
        Returns:
        OutputStream the Output for the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the file path specified already exists or is otherwise invalid

      • readAsset

        java.io.InputStream readAsset(java.lang.String file)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Method to read in an asset from a file location. Should behave differently than readFile(String)
        Parameters:
        file - the location of the assset to be read in
        Returns:
        the InputStream object of the loaded file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the file path specified is incorrect

      • getSharedPref

        SharedPreferences getSharedPref()
        Method to return preference data (android API) from the app-wide settings
        Returns:
        SharedPreferences object that can then be accessed/modified as necessary
